TI: [Concentration of nucleolar nucleic acids in the nucleus raphe dorsalis and CA3 hippocampus of the rat brain during deprivation of the paradoxical phase of sleep].
AB: Two-wave-length visible cytophotometry showed an increase of nuclein acids (NAs) in neurons of the n. raphe dorsalis and the decrease in SA3 of the rat hippocampus after paradoxical sleep deprivation; the NA content was unchanged in gliocytes. A correlation between NA metabolism and function of structures is discussed.
TT: Soderzhanie iadryshkovykh nukleinovykh kislot v nucleus raphe dorsalis i CA3 hippocampus golovnogo mozga krys pri lishenii paradoksal'noi fazy sna.
TA: Fiziol Zh SSSR Im I M Sechenova
JT: Fiziologicheskii zhurnal SSSR imeni I. M. Sechenova
SO: Fiziol Zh SSSR Im I M Sechenova. 1985 Jun;71(6):753-6.
